UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Identification and characterization of multifunctional cationic peptides from enzymatic hydrolysates of soybean proteins.
Literature.Author: Taniguchi M, Aida R, Saito K, Kikura T, Ochiai A, Saitoh E, Tanaka T

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Porphyromonas gingivalis ATCC 33277(IC50=26.8µM),Cutibacterium acnes JCM 6473(IC50=139µM),Streptococcus mutans JCM 5705(no activity data),Candida albicans NBRC 1385(IC50=49.8µM)
